nodes.text: Turazza Eggs is short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer, seen on page 52 of the RPG source book The DarkStryder Campaign which was published by West End Games in July 1995. It was part of the "Command Crew" section of the Campaign Book. The story depicts Loh'khar hatching three Turazza egg.

In Galliwig's Cantina, Loh'khar looks over his latest acquisition—three gray-green mottled eggs. The owner of the cantina, Galliwig, believes that Loh'khar got the raw end of the deal with the eggs, and offers him 25 credits to take them off his hands.

Loh'khar declines, believing that there is no bad end to a deal. As Loh'kar and Galliwig look on, the eggs hatch and three baby Turazza are born. Loh'khar imprints himself on the three Turazza and welcomes them to his business.
